name: Maruti Grand Vitara
description: The price of Maruti Grand Vitara, a 5 seater SUV, ranges from Rs. 10.87  - 19.97 Lakh. It is available in 17 variants, with engine options ranging from 1462 to 1490 cc and a choice of 2 transmissions: Manual and Automatic. Grand Vitara comes with 6 airbags. Maruti Grand Vitara has a ground clearance of 210 mm  and is available in 10 colours. Users have reported a mileage of 20.58 to 27.97 kmpl for Grand Vitara.
